code: class  Solution  {   public :   bool  containsPattern ( vector < int >&  arr ,  int  m ,  int  k )  {   int  count  =  0 ;   for  ( int  i  =  m ;  i  <  arr . size ();  ++ i )  {   count  =  arr [ i ]  ==  arr [ i  -  m ]  ?  count  +  1  :  0 ;   if  ( count  ==  m  *  k  -  m )   return  true ;   }   return  false ;   }  };
